mapper.select: select new_filename from photo where photo_folder_idx=#{idx} and photo_category_idx=1
SELECT p.new_filename FROM photo p JOIN store_menu m ON m.menu_idx = p.photo_folder_idx WHERE m.store_idx = 1 AND m.menu_category = '안주' AND p.photo_category_idx = 2 ORDER BY p.photo_folder_idx ASC;
SELECT p.new_filename FROM photo p JOIN store_menu m ON m.menu_idx = p.photo_folder_idx WHERE m.store_idx = 1 AND m.menu_category = '술' AND p.photo_category_idx = 6 ORDER BY p.photo_folder_idx ASC;
select menu_name,menu_price from store_menu where store_idx=#{idx} and menu_category='안주' ORDER BY menu_idx ASC
select menu_name,menu_price from store_menu where store_idx=#{idx} and menu_category='술' ORDER BY menu_idx ASC
select * from board where store_idx=#{idx} ORDER BY board_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT store_idx FROM store WHERE store_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param1}, '%')
SELECT store_idx FROM store_menu WHERE menu_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param1}, '%') GROUP BY store_idx
SELECT store_idx FROM store WHERE store_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param1}, '%')
